food.title: yurble jelly pops
food.description: chewy jelly lollypops shaped just like yurble heads.

food.title: whole purplum jelly
food.description: far more interesting than your average orange jelly.

food.title: strawberry trifle
food.description: layers of jelly, fruit, cake and custard make this a truly wonderful dessert.

food.title: strawberry cybunny cake
food.description: an interesting blend of cake and strawberry flavoured jelly.

food.title: 1/3 carrot and pea omelette
food.description: a strange combination, but nevertheless tasty. there doesnt seem to be much left, somebody has been munching away on it apparently.
